A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So I decided to see this a second time before making a review and I'm glad I did. We went this time to the 3D IMAX showing and that didn't make much difference but seeing it another time did. The first time I went I felt the movie spent too much time setting up the next one\, Chapter IX\, but I see how it all fits together this time. A very good movie with a lot of great CGI and some live action. Maybe a bit too much psycho-babble-religious-mumbo-jumbo\, but otherwise well done. Only Adam Driver really stands out but everyone else does a credible job. This chapter shows the direction future Star Wars movies will go and it looks terrific. Highly recommended for all the right reasons.
